Venusian Animals.Action or On-going Effect text: Effect: When you play a science tag, including this, add 1 animal to this card.
Venusian Animals.One time Effect Text: Requires Venus 18%. 1 VP for each animal on this card.

Venusian Insects.Action or On-going Effect text: Action: Add 1 microbe to this card.
Venusian Insects.One time Effect Text: Requires Venus 12%. 1 VP per 2 microbes on this card.

Venusian Plants.One time Effect Text: Requires Venus 16%. Raise Venus 1 step. Add 1 microbe or 1 animal to ANOTHER VENUS CARD.

Airliners.One time Effect Text: Requires that you have 3 floaters. Increase your MC production 2 steps. Add 2 floaters to ANOTHER card.

Air Raid.One time Effect Text: Requires that you lose 1 floater. Steal 5 MC from any player.

Atmo Collectors.Action or On-going Effect text: Action: Add 1 floater to this card, or spend 1 floater here to gain 2 titanium, or 3 energy, or 4 heat.

Community Services.One time Effect Text: Increase your MC production 1 step per CARD WITH NO TAGS, including this.

Conscription.One time Effect Text: Requires 2 Earth tags. The next card you play this generation costs 16 MC less.

Corona Extractor.One time Effect Text: Requires 4 science tags. Increase your energy production 4 steps.

Cryo-Sleep.Action or On-going Effect text: Effect: When you trade, you pay 1 less resource for it.

Ecology Research.One time Effect Text: Increase your plant production 1 step for each colony you own. Add 1 animal to ANOTHER card and 2 microbes to ANOTHER card.

Floater Leasing.One time Effect Text: Increase your MC production 1 step per 3 floaters you have.

Floater Technology.Action or On-going Effect text: Action: Add 1 floater to ANOTHER card.

Gaillean Waystation.One time Effect Text: Increase your MC production 1 step for every Jovian tags in play.

Heavy Taxation.One time Effect Text: Requires 2 Earth tags. Increase your MC production 2 steps, and gain 4 MC.

Impactor Swarm.One time Effect Text: Requries 2 Jovian tags. Gain 12 heat. Remove up to 2 plants from any player.

Jovian Lanterns.Action or On-going Effect text: Action: Spend 1 titanium to add 2 floaters here.
Jovian Lanterns.One time Effect Text: Requires 1 Jovian tag. Increase your TR 1 step. Add 2 floaters to ANY card. 1 VP per 2 floaters here.

Jupiter Floating Station.Action or On-going Effect text: Action: Add 1 floater to a JOVIAN CARD, or gain 1 MC for every floater here (Max 4).

Luna Governor.One time Effect Text: Requires 3 Earch tags. Increase your MC production 2 steps.

Lunar Exports.One time Effect Text: Increase your plant production 2 steps, or increase your MC production 5 steps.

Lunar Mining.One time Effect Text: Increase your titanium production. 1 step for every 2 Earth tags you have in play, including this.

Market Manipulation.One time Effect Text: Increase one colony tile track 1 step. Decrease another colony tile track 1 step

Martian Zoo.Action or On-going Effect text: Effect: when you play an Earth tag, place an animal here. Action: Gain 1 MC per animal here.

Mining Colony.One time Effect Text: Increase your titanium production 1 step. Place a colony.

Minority Refuge.One time Effect Text: Decrese your MC production 2 steps. Place a colony.

Molecular Printing.One time Effect Text: Gain 1 MC fo each city tile in play. Gain 1 MC for each colony in play.

Nitrogen from Titan.One time Effect Text: Raise your TR 2 steps. Add 2 floaters to a JOVIAN CARD.

Pioneer Settlement.One time Effect Text: Requires that you have no more than 1 colony. Decrease your MC production 2 steps. Place a colony.

Quantum Communications.One time Effect Text: Requires 4 science tags. Increase your MC production 1 step for each colony in play.

Red Spot Observatory.Action or On-going Effect text: Action: Add 1 floater to this card, or spend 1 floater here to draw a card.

Refugee Camps.Action or On-going Effect text: Action: Decrease your MC production 1 step to add a camp resource to this card.
Refugee Camps.One time Effect Text: 1 VP for each camp resource on this card.

Research Colony.One time Effect Text: Place a colony. MAY BE PLACED WHERE YOU ALREADY HAVE A COLONY. Draw 2 cards.

Rim Freighters.Action or On-going Effect text: Effect: When you trade, you pay 1 less resource for it.

Sky Docks.Action or On-going Effect text: Effect: When you play a card, you pay 1 MC less for it.
Sky Docks.One time Effect Text: Requires 2 Earth tags. Gain 1 Trade Fleet.

Solar Probe.One time Effect Text: Draw 1 card for every 3 science tags you have, including this.

Space Port.One time Effect Text: Requires 1 colony. Gain 1 Trade Fleet. Place a city tile. Decrease your energy production 1 step, and increase your MC production 4 steps.

Space Port Colony.One time Effect Text: Requires a colony. Place a colony. MAY BE PLACED ON A COLONY TILE WHERE YOU ALREADY HAVE A COLONY. Gain 1 Trade Fleet. 1 VP per 2 colonies in play.

Spin-Off Department.Action or On-going Effect text: Effect: WHEN PLAYING A CARD WITH A BASIC COST OF 20 MC OR MORE, draw a card

Sub-Zero Salt Fish.Action or On-going Effect text: Action: Add 1 animal to this card.
Sub-Zero Salt Fish.One time Effect Text: Requires -6°C or warmer. Decrease any plant production 1 step. 1 VP per 2 animals on this card.

Titan Air-Scrapping.Action or On-going Effect text: Action: Spend 1 titanium to add 2 floaters to this card, or spend 2 floaters here to increase your TR 1 step.

Titan Floating Launch-Pad.Action or On-going Effect text: Action: Add 1 floater to ANY JOVIAN CARD, or spend 1 floater here to trade for free
Titan Floating Launch-Pad.One time Effect Text: Add 2 foaters to ANY JOVIAN CARD.

Titan Shuttles.Action or On-going Effect text: Action: Add 2 floaters to ANY JOVIAN CARD, or spend any number of floaters here to gain the same number of titanium.

Trade Envoys.Action or On-going Effect text: Effect: When you trade, you may first increase that Colony Tile track 1 step.

Trading Colony.Action or On-going Effect text: Effect: When you trade, you may first increase that Colony Tile track 1 step.

Urban Decomposers.One time Effect Text: Requires that you have 1 city tile and 1 colony in play. Increase your plant production 1 step, and add 2 microbes to ANOTHER card.

Warp Drive.Action or On-going Effect text: Effect: When you play a space tag, you pay 4 MC less for it.

Allied Bank.One time Effect Text: Increase your MC production 4 steps. Gain 3 MC.

Aquifer Turbines.One time Effect Text: Place an ocean tile. Increase your energy production 2 steps. Remove 3 MC.

Biofuels.One time Effect Text: Increase your plant production and energy production 1 step each. Gain 2 plants.

Biolabs.One time Effect Text: Increase your plant production 1 step. Draw 3 cards.

Biosphere Support.One time Effect Text: Decrease your MC production 1 step. Increase your plant production 2 steps.

Business Empire.One time Effect Text: Increase your MC production 6 steps. Remove 6 MC.

Dome Farming.One time Effect Text: Increase your plant production 1 step. Increase your MC production 2 steps.

Early Settlement.One time Effect Text: Place a city tile. Increase your plant production 1 step.

Ecology Experts.One time Effect Text: Increase your plant production 1 step. Play a card from Hand, ignoring global requirements

Excentric Sponsor.One time Effect Text: Play a card from hand, reducing its costs by 25 MC

Experimental Forest.One time Effect Text: Place a greenery tile and increase oxygen 1 step. Reveal cards from the deck until you have revealed 2 plant-tag cards. Take these into your hand, and discard the rest.

Galilean Mining.One time Effect Text: Increase your titanium production 2 steps. Remove 5 MC.

Io Research Outpost.One time Effect Text: Increase your titanium production 1 step. Draw 1 card.

Loan.One time Effect Text: Decrease your MC production 2 steps. Gain 30 MC.

Martian Industries.One time Effect Text: Increase your energy production and steel production 1 step each. Gain 6 MC.

Metal-Rich Asteroid.One time Effect Text: Raise temperature 1 step. Gain 4 titanium, and 4 steel.

Metals Company.One time Effect Text: Increase your MC production, steel production, and titanium production 1 step each.

Mining Operations.One time Effect Text: Increase your steel production 2 steps. Gain 4 steel.

Mohole.One time Effect Text: Increse your heat production 3 steps. Gain 3 heat.

Mohole Excavation.One time Effect Text: Increase your steel production 1 step, and your heat production 2 steps. Gain 2 heat.

Nitrogen Shipment.One time Effect Text: Raise your terraform rating 1 step. Increase your plant production 1 step. Gain 5 MC.

Orbital Construction Yard.One time Effect Text: Increase your titanium produciton [sic] 1 step. Gain 4 titanium.

Polar Industries.One time Effect Text: Place 1 ocean tile. Increase your heat production 2 steps.

Research Network.One time Effect Text: Draw 3 cards, and increase your MC production 1 step. After being played, when you perform an action, the wild tag is any tag of your choice.

Self-Sufficient Settlement.One time Effect Text: Place a city tile. Increase your MC production 2 steps.

Society Support.One time Effect Text: Decrease your MC production  1 step. Increase your plant production, energy production, and heat production 1 step each.

Supplier.One time Effect Text: Increase your energy production 2 steps. Gain 4 steel.

UNMI Contractor.One time Effect Text: Raise your terraform rating 3 steps. Draw 1 card.

Acquired Space Agency.One time Effect Text: Gain 6 titanium. Reveal cards from the deck until you have revealed 2 space cards. Take those into hand, and discard the rest.

Lava Tube Settlement.One time Effect Text: Decrease your energy production 1 step. Increase your MC production 2 steps. Place a city tile ON A VOLCANIC AREA, same as Lava Flows, regardless of adjacent cities.

Martian Survey.One time Effect Text: Oxygen must be 4% or lower. Draw 2 cards.

Psychrophiles.Action or On-going Effect text: Action: Add a microbe to this card. Effect: When paying for a plant card, microbes here may be used as 2 MC each.

Research Coordination.One time Effect Text: After being played, when you perform an action, the wild tag counts as any tag of your choice.

Space Hotels.One time Effect Text: Requires 2 Earth tags. Increase your MC production 4 steps.

Aphrodite.Action or On-going Effect text: Effect: Whenever Venus is terraformed 1 step, you gain 2 MC.
Aphrodite.One time Effect Text: You start with 47 MC and 1 plant production.

Aridor.Action or On-going Effect text: Effect: When you get a new type of tag in play (event cards do not count), increase your MC production 1 step.
Aridor.One time Effect Text: You start with 40 MC. As your first action, put an additional Colony Tile of your choice into play.

Arklight.Action or On-going Effect text: Effect: When you play an animal or plant tag, including this, add 1 animal to this card.
Arklight.One time Effect Text: You start with 45 MC. Increase your MC production 2 steps. 1 VP per 2 animals on this card.

Celestic.Action or On-going Effect text: Action: Add a floater to ANY card.
Celestic.One time Effect Text: You start with 42 MC. As your first action, reveal cards from the deck until you have revealed 2 cards with a floater icon on it. Take those 2 cards into hand, and discard the rest. 1 VP per 3 floaters on this card.

Cheung Shing Mars.Action or On-going Effect text: Effect: When you play a building tag, you pay 2 MC less for it.
Cheung Shing Mars.One time Effect Text: You start with 44 MC and 3 MC production.

CrediCor.Action or On-going Effect text: Effect: After you pay for a card or standard project with a basic cost of 20 MC or more, you gain 4 MC.

Ecoline.Action or On-going Effect text: Effect: You may always pay 7 plants, instead of 8, to place 1 greenery.
Ecoline.One time Effect Text: You start with 2 plant production, 3 plants, and 36 MC.

Helion.Action or On-going Effect text: Effect: You may use heat as MC. You may not use MC as heat.
Helion.One time Effect Text: You start with 3 heat production and 42 MC.

Interplanetary Cinematics.Action or On-going Effect text: Effect: Each time you play an event, you gain 2 MC.
Interplanetary Cinematics.One time Effect Text: You start with 20 steel and 30 MC.

Inventrix.Action or On-going Effect text: Effect: Your temperature, oxygen, and ocean requirements are +2 or -2 steps, your choice in each case.
Inventrix.One time Effect Text: As your first action in the game, draw 3 cards. Start with 45 MC.

Manutech.Action or On-going Effect text: Effect: For each step you increase the production of a resource, including this, you also gain that resource.
Manutech.One time Effect Text: You start with 1 steel production and 35 MC.

Mining Guild.Action or On-going Effect text: Effect: Each time you get any steel or titanium as a placement bonus on the map, increase your steel production 1 step.
Mining Guild.One time Effect Text: The earliest private enterprises on Mars focused on mining and exporting minerals off the surface. As the mega-corporations arrive to terraform, the miners unite in the Guild to defend their interests. With their expertise and knowledg of the planet they will be a worthy contender in the race.

Morning Star Inc..Action or On-going Effect text: Effect: Your Venus requirements are +/- 2 steps, your choice in each case.
Morning Star Inc..One time Effect Text: You start with 50 MC. As your first action, reveal cards from the deck until you have revealed 3 Venus-tag cards. Take those into hand and discard the rest.

PhoboLog.Action or On-going Effect text: Effect: Your titanium resources are each worth 1 MC extra.
PhoboLog.One time Effect Text: You start with 10 titanium and 23 MC

Point Luna.Action or On-going Effect text: Effect: When you play a Earth tag, including this, draw a card.
Point Luna.One time Effect Text: You start with 38 MC and 1 titanium production.

Polyphemos.Action or On-going Effect text: Effect: When you buy a card to hand, pay 5 MC instead of 3 MC, including the starting hand.
Polyphemos.One time Effect Text: You start with 50 MC. Increase your MC production 5 steps. Gain 5 titanium.

Poseidon.Action or On-going Effect text: Effect: When any colony is placed, including this, raise your MC production 1 step.
Poseidon.One time Effect Text: You start with 45 MC. As your first action, place a colony.

Robinson Industries.Action or On-going Effect text: Action: Spend 4 MC to increase (one of) your LOWEST PRODUCTION 1 step.

Saturn Systems.Action or On-going Effect text: Effect: Each time any Jovian tag is put into play, including this, increase your MC production 1 step.
Saturn Systems.One time Effect Text: You start with 1 titanium production and 42 MC.

Stormcraft Incorporated.Action or On-going Effect text: Action: Add 1 floater to ANY card. Effect: Floaters on this card may be used as 2 heat each

Teractor.Action or On-going Effect text: Effect: When playing an Earth card, you pay 3 MC less for it.

Tharsis Republic.Action or On-going Effect text: Effect: When any city tile is placed ON MARS, increase your MC production 1 step. When you place a city tile, gain 3 MC.
Tharsis Republic.One time Effect Text: You start with 40 MC. As your first action in the game, place a city tile.

ThorGate.Action or On-going Effect text: Effect: When playing a power card OR THE STANDARD PROJECT POWER PLANT, you pay 3 MC less for it.
ThorGate.One time Effect Text: You start with 1 energy production and 48 MC.

United Nations Mars Initiative.Action or On-going Effect text: Action: If your Terraform Rating was raised this generation, you may pay 3 MC to raise it 1 step more.

Valley Trust.Action or On-going Effect text: Effect: When you play a science tag, you pay 2 MC less for it.
Valley Trust.One time Effect Text: You start with 37 MC. As your first action, draw 3 Prelude cards, and play one of them. Discard the other two.

Viron.Action or On-going Effect text: Action: Use a blue card action that has already been used this generation.

Vitor.Action or On-going Effect text: Effect: When you play a card with a NON-NEGATIVE VP icon, including this, gain 3 MC.
Vitor.One time Effect Text: You start with 45 MC. As your first action, fund an award for free.
